subdisciplines.name: Film theory
subdisciplines.description: The study of film as an art form and its relation to cultural and social contexts.

subdisciplines.name: Film criticism
subdisciplines.description: The evaluation and analysis of films from an aesthetic, historical, and cultural perspective.

subdisciplines.name: Film preservation and restoration
subdisciplines.description: The practice of protecting and restoring deteriorating films in order to preserve the cinema heritage.

subdisciplines.name: Film programming and exhibition
subdisciplines.description: The practice of selecting, organizing, and presenting films for public viewing, including film festivals, museums, and theaters.
